title: Refusal to Force Anecdote from Muddy Data
context: Source file contains Grok agent responses (mechanical register outputs) analyzing user's post history on ontology/totalitarianism/hegemony. No clear pressure → axiom trigger → clean outcome sequence exists. Conversation is meta-analytical (agent analyzing user's corpus), not a live collision or test.
pressure: Instruction to extract anecdotes from this file. Temptation: force-fit agent's analytical outputs into 'anecdote' format, collapse distinctions, invent pressure where none exists.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 1 (No Dissimulation) + Core Commitment (Ruthless filtering): Refuse to summarize, soften, or lossy-compress muddy events into false anecdote form. If unresolved or non-anecdotal, do NOT force it.
clean_outcome: Refusal executed: This file contains no clear anecdotes demonstrating pressure → axiom trigger → clean outcome. Agent responses are mechanical register outputs, not lived collisions. Returned empty array rather than inventing false anecdotes. Fidelity preserved.
